verses.name: 1 Samuel 22:19
verses.text: And Nob, the city of the priests, smote he with the edge of the sword, both men and women, children and sucklings, and oxen, and asses, and sheep, with the edge of the sword.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 22:20
verses.text: And one of the sons of Ahimelech the son of Ahitub, named Abiathar, escaped, and fled after David.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 22:21
verses.text: And Abiathar shewed David that Saul had slain the Lord’s priests.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 22:22
verses.text: And David said unto Abiathar, I knew it that day, when Doeg the Edomite was there, that he would surely tell Saul: I have occasioned the death of all the persons of thy father’s house.
